con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="X-OpenAM-Username" value="test12345"/> <con:entry key="X-OpenAM-Password" value="secret12"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:testSuite.name: CompleteFlow- TRIGSTED

con:config.script: import utilities.*; log.info "Configuring properties..." def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def projectDir = groovyUtils.projectPath def myTestCase = context.testCase log.info projectDir Properties properties = new Properties() File propertiesFile = new File(projectDir + '\\config.properties') propertiesFile.withInputStream {def project = context.testCase.testSuite.project properties.load(it) } def project = context.testCase.testSuite.project project.setPropertyValue("URL",properties.QURL) project.setPropertyValue("QEndpoint",properties.QEndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("AEndpoint",properties.AEndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("REndpoint",properties.REndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("LAEndpoint",properties.LAEndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("CourseEndpoint",properties.CourseEndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("SCourseEndpoint",properties.SCourseEndpoint) project.setPropertyValue("WorkbookNamePath",properties.WorkbookNamePath) project.setPropertyValue("E2ESheetNo",properties.E2ESheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("QuestionSheetNo",properties.QuestionSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("AnswerSheetNo",properties.AnswerSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("Resource4QuestionSheetNo",properties.Resource4QuestionSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("Resource4AnswerSheetNo",properties.Resource4AnswerSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("LAQuestionSheetNo",properties.LAQuestionSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("LAAssessmentSheetNo",properties.LAAssessmentSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("ChapterLASheetNo",properties.ChapterLASheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("CourseLASheetNo",properties.CourseLASheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("CourseUserSheetNo",properties.CourseUserSheetNo) project.setPropertyValue("GetCourse",properties.GetCourse) project.setPropertyValue("learnerid",properties.learnerid) project.setPropertyValue("Execution",properties.ExecutionSheet) project.setPropertyValue("EventsSheetNo",properties.EventsSheetNo) log.info "Properties added successfully..." //====================================================== myvar = context.expand('${#Project#WorkbookNamePath}') def path = projectDir +'\\'+ myvar def Exec = context.expand('${#Project#Execution}') log.info path log.info "Reading Input test files..." Object[][] ObjAr = ExcelUtils.getTableArray(path,Exec) try{ def testSuite = context.testCase.testSuite; def totalTestCases = testSuite.getTestCases().size(); log.info "Total testCases are " + totalTestCases def size = ObjAr.size().toInteger() for (x in (0..ObjAr.size()-1)){ if(ObjAr[x][1].toString()=="No"){ testSuite.getTestCaseByName(ObjAr[x][0].toString()).setDisabled(true) log.info "Skipping TestCase : "+(testSuite.getTestCaseAt(x).name) } else if (testSuite.getTestCaseByName(ObjAr[x][0].toString()).isDisabled()){ testSuite.getTestCaseByName(ObjAr[x][0].toString()).setDisabled(false) log.info "Enabling Test Cases : " +(testSuite.getTestCaseAt(x).name) } } } catch(Exception e){ log.info e } //======================================================== //def propTestStep = project.testSuites["Complete Flow"].testCases["Complete Flow (End2End)"].getTestStepByName("Property - Request") //def propTestStep = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties") //propTestStep.setPropertyValue("wloop","1") //propTestStep.setPropertyValue("wloop","1") //propTestStep.setPropertyValue("wcount","1")

con:testCase.name: Answers
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Answers] located at [/dcms/v1/answers]

con:config.script:
import utilities.*;
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def myTestCase = context.testCase def projectDir = groovyUtils.projectPath myvar = context.expand('${#Project#WorkbookNamePath}') def path = projectDir +'\\'+ myvar def Sname = context.expand('${#Project#AnswerSheetNo}') log.info path log.info "Reading Input test files..."
//def path = "D:\\Master\\DataSheet\\Trigsted.xlsx" //def Sname = "Answer" Object[][] ObjAr = ExcelUtils.getTableArray(path,Sname)
//================================ def size = ObjAr.size().toInteger() log.info size
propTestStep = myTestCase.getTestStepByName("Properties") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Total", size.toString())
counter = propTestStep.getPropertyValue("Count").toString() counter = counter.toInteger() next = (counter > size-2? 0: counter+1)
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Count", next.toString())
tempValue = ObjAr[counter] propTestStep.setPropertyValue("ID", tempValue[0]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("subType", tempValue[1]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("question", tempValue[2])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("label", tempValue[3]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("value", tempValue[4]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("isCorrect", tempValue[5]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("score", tempValue[6]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("mastery", tempValue[8]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("heading", tempValue[9]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("text", tempValue[10])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("label2", tempValue[11]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("value2", tempValue[12]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("isCorrect2", tempValue[13]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("score2", tempValue[14]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("mastery2", tempValue[15]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("heading2", tempValue[16]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("text2", tempValue[17])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("label3", tempValue[18]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("value3", tempValue[19]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("isCorrect3", tempValue[20]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("score3", tempValue[21]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("mastery3", tempValue[22]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("heading3", tempValue[23]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("text3", tempValue[24])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("label4", tempValue[25]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("value4", tempValue[26]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("isCorrect4", tempValue[27]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("score4", tempValue[28]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("mastery4", tempValue[29]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("heading4", tempValue[30]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("text4", tempValue[31])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("strategy", tempValue[32]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("style", tempValue[33]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("endpoint", tempValue[34]) //propTestStep.setPropertyValue("params", tempValue[35])
next++
log.info "Reading line : ${(counter+1)} / $size" propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Next", next.toString()) log.info "Value '$tempValue' -- updated in $propTestStep.name"
if (counter == size-1) { propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "T") log.info "Setting the stoploop property now..." } else if (counter==0) { def runner = new com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.testcase.WsdlTestCaseRunner(testRunner.testCase, null) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "F") } else { propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "F") }

con:config.script:
import utilities.*;
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def myTestCase = context.testCase def projectDir = groovyUtils.projectPath myvar = context.expand('${#Project#WorkbookNamePath}') def path = projectDir +'\\'+ myvar def Sname = context.expand('${#Project#CourseUserSheetNo}') log.info path log.info "Reading Input test files..."
//def path = "D:\\Master\\DataSheet\\Trigsted.xlsx" //def Sname = "Answer" Object[][] ObjAr = ExcelUtils.getTableArray(path,Sname)
//================================ def size = ObjAr.size().toInteger() log.info size
propTestStep = myTestCase.getTestStepByName("Properties") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Total", size.toString())
counter = propTestStep.getPropertyValue("Count").toString() counter = counter.toInteger() next = (counter > size-2? 0: counter+1)
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Count", next.toString())
tempValue = ObjAr[counter]
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("ID", tempValue[0]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("docType", tempValue[1]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("subType", tempValue[2]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("version", tempValue[3]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("scope", tempValue[4]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("expiresOn", tempValue[5]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("learnerId", tempValue[6]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("group", tempValue[7]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("CourseId", tempValue[8]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("productId", tempValue[9])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("constraintsAge", tempValue[10]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Region", tempValue[11]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("objectives", tempValue[12]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("tags", tempValue[13]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("authorsName", tempValue[14]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("authorType", tempValue[15]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("rel", tempValue[16]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("href", tempValue[17]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("ownerName", tempValue[18]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("ownerType", tempValue[19]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("rel2", tempValue[20]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("href2", tempValue[21]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("extensionsStatus", tempValue[22]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resources", tempValue[23])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourceDocType", tempValue[24]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourceSubType", tempValue[25]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourceScope", tempValue[26]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("rel3", tempValue[27]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("href3", tempValue[28]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("extension1", tempValue[29])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourcePlanTreeType", tempValue[30]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("lang1", tempValue[31]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("desc1", tempValue[32])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourceref2", tempValue[33]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("childrenType", tempValue[34]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("lang2", tempValue[35]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("desc2", tempValue[36]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("resourceref3", tempValue[37]) /* propTestStep.setPropertyValue("AGStartNode1", tempValue[37]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("AGEndNode1", tempValue[38]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("relationship1", tempValue[39])
propTestStep.setPropertyValue("AGStartNode2", tempValue[40]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("AGEndNode2", tempValue[41]) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("relationship2", tempValue[42]) */ next++
log.info "Reading line : ${(counter+1)} / $size" propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Next", next.toString()) log.info "Value '$tempValue' -- updated in $propTestStep.name"
if (counter == size-1) { propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "T") log.info "Setting the stoploop property now..." } else if (counter==0) { def runner = new com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.testcase.WsdlTestCaseRunner(testRunner.testCase, null) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "F") } else { propTestStep.setPropertyValue("StopLoop", "F") }
